journal-meta.journal-title: Vision: The Journal of Business Perspective

p.bold: The Indian CEOs: Competencies for Success: Keys to Outstanding Indian Corporate Leadership, Vision: The Journal of Business Perspective, January 2008, 12(1), 1–10 (DOI: 10.1177/097226290801200102)
By Signe M. Spencer, Seetharaman Mohan, Tharuma Rajah, Gaurav Lahiri, and S.A. Narayan

body.p: This is to confirm that S.A. Narayan is the co-author of the article ‘The Indian CEOs: Competencies for Success: Keys to Outstanding Indian Corporate Leadership’ that was published in Vision: The Journal of Business Perspective, Volume 12, Issue 1. The name was inadvertently missed out in the published article.
